A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm not going to say this was the worst film I've seen in a while\, but it is the most disappointing one. Rian Johnson has taken a sharp left turn with The Last Jedi\, running over the old fandom in the process.  Between bizarre story choices\, blatant continuity errors\, and weird pacing\, This isn't just a bad Star Wars movie\, its a lackluster film in general.
